metadata.Title: CVE-2022-48619 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in drivers/input/input.c in the Linux kernel before5.17.10. An attacker can cause a denial of service (panic) becauseinput_set_capability mishandles the situation in which an event code fallsoutside of a bitmap.
